name: Puma Cat - The Paranormal Psychic Detective
name_original: Puma Cat - The Paranormal Psychic Detective
description:
Made for JamDNA 12!  All sprite art was created from scratch in Photoshop CC.  Game engine is Unity.  About 50% C# Scripts were learned and modified from Blackthornprod YouTube channel.  The other 50% I created from scratch.

Controls:  WSAD movement, left-mouse click shoots psychic blasts.

Criteria for this game jam:

Visual Novel ->  The levels are pages of a book.  After combat, read the page and move on to the next chapter.

Animals -> The main characters is a cat named, Puma Cat.

Mysterious -> The story has a mystery that revolves around ghost cats.

Extra diegetic music -> There is a ghost cat band on every page, playing music that matches the scene.
